title: scope attribute
description: The HTML `scope` attributes lets authors define the scope of a table header (row or column).

references.title: HTML AAM rules for the scope attribute

assertions.title: MUST convey the header according to context if scope is set to "auto"
assertions.rationale: The user needs to be able to determine what headers a cell belongs to.

assertions.title: MUST convey the header as a column header if the scope is set to "column"
assertions.rationale: The user needs to be able to determine what headers a cell belongs to.

assertions.title: MUST convey the header as a row header if the scope is set to "row"
assertions.rationale: The user needs to be able to determine what headers a cell belongs to.
